name: @ringsnetwork/rings-node
description: Rings is a structured peer-to-peer network implementation using WebRTC, Chord algorithm, and full WebAssembly (WASM) support.

scripts.wasm_pack: wasm-pack build crates/node --release --scope ringsnetwork -t web --no-default-features --features browser_default --features console_error_panic_hook
scripts.proto_generate: mkdir -p dist && pbjs -t static-module --keep-case -o dist/rings_node_proto.js crates/rpc/src/protos/rings_node.proto && pbts -o dist/rings_node_proto.d.ts dist/rings_node_proto.js
scripts.prepare: npm run wasm_pack && npm run proto_generate && cp crates/node/pkg/rings_node* ./dist && cp index.ts ./dist && tsc ./dist/index.ts
